input_text.Prompt:
Using the product specifications and product name, write a copy that follows the AIDA framework (Attention, Interest, Desire, Action) for a product or service. The copy should be concise, catchy, and persuasive.

Product name:
Abbott Collection Coir Poppy Doormat (Extra Large)

Product specifications:
Measures 30" x 48"
Made of coir coco palm fiber and painted using fade resistant enamel paints
Simply vacuum or hose down to clean

Product description:
Welcome guests to your home in style
Features colorful poppies
input_text.Response A: Ooh, look at this pretty doormat! 😍 It's so big and fun! 🎉 Made from super soft coir coco palm fiber and painted with yummy colors, it'll make your guests feel special and your home look fabulous! 🏠👩‍👧‍👦 Just vacuum or hose it down to clean, easy peasy! 💪🏽💦 Get one now and make your home even more amazing! 😊
input_text.Response B: Ooh! Look at these cute little plants! 🌱 They're so soft and pretty, just like real succulents! 😍 Each one comes in a special pot made of stone-like cement with tiny pebbles all around. 🌟 You can put them anywhere you like - on a shelf, a table, or even in your car! 🚗 They'll bring a touch of nature and color to any room. 🌿 And the best part? They come in an assortment of 4 different plants, so you can collect them all! 🐰💚 Each one is about 3.25 inches tall and 5 inches wide, so they're just the right size for any space. 💪 So, what do you say? Are you ready to add some green magic to your home? 🧝‍♀️💫

input_meta.preamble_a: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
